ProjectTitle: Dietary interventions for disorders of gut-brain interaction: FODMAPs and beyond FODMAPs
InitialFeedbackHistory:
18/06/2024
In the research summary, for physical data (urinary samples, biopsies), can you indicate how many you plan to collect? 
Ethics: since you are using personal/human data and need ethical approval, please include your EC approval reference (S number) in the DMP.

Documentation & metadata: since you use Qualtrics and RedCap, you will also have documentation that can be exported from those tools, eg the questionnaire form, variable definitions, etc. 

Data storage: note that OneDrive is not suitable for personal data. Sharepoint is. Make this distinction.
label: not good
